title: Advocacy Committee for Fire District 3
body: The Board shall appoint community members to serve in the "in favor" or the "opposed" Advocacy committee for the purpose of ballot preparation of anticipated Levy Lid Lift in the general election.  Advocacy committee's must be residents of San Juan County or own property in San Juan County.  If interested, please contact the Fire Chief by phone (360) 378-5334 or email at nmonin@sjifire.org
lede: Notice for public participation in serving on an Advocacy Committee for Fire District 3.
